option.creeperconfetti.chance.descriptio: Chance for a creeper to explode into confetti. (0 ~ 1, default: 0.1)
option.creeperconfetti.damage.descriptio: Ratio of damage if a creeper will explode into confetti. (0 ~ 1, default: 0)
option.creeperconfetti.soundChance.descr: Chance to play sound effect if a creeper will explode into confetti. (0 ~ 1, default: 0.05)
